ðŸ“– Summary: Plexe allows users to create machine learning models by describing them in plain language. It leverages a multi-agent architecture to automate model building, supporting features like distributed training with Ray, data generation, schema inference, and multi-provider LLM support. The primary use case is to simplify and accelerate the process of building ML models through natural language.
